metadata.name: Surfaxin Suspension
metadata.composition: 1 Palmitoyl 2 oleoyl sn glycero 3 phospho rac 1 glycerol

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Palmitoyloleoyl phosphatidylglycerol was a component of Surfaxin which was indicated for the prevention of respiratory distress syndrome in premature infants

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Palmitoyloleoyl phosphatidylglycerol is a replacement surfactant which prevents alveolar collapse when administered intratracheally
